section.title: Enabling Capacity and Utilization Data Collection for a Cluster
section.para: Enable Capacity & Utilization data collection for a Cluster.

procedure.title: To Enable Capacity and Utilization Data Collection for a Cluster

step.para: From the right pane, select C & U Collection.

listitem.para: To enable capacity and utilization data collection for all the Clusters in a cloud provider, select Collect for All Clusters.
To enable capacity and utilization data collection by a Cluster, select the desired Cluster from the list under Enable Collection by Cluster.
